segments.text: Well , let's have your firm order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here is our offer , 30,000 skirts at 200 yuan per skirt , FOB New York . You will find our price comes in line with the prevailing market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your price is rather high . We cannot accept it . Can you bring the price down a little ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In fact , if it weren't for our good relations , we wouldn't consider making you a firm order at this price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't agree with you . We have quotation from other sources too . Their prices are lower than yours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you know our design is superior to any other products from other companies . In fact , there is no room to negotiate the price now . You should be aware that the production cost alone has doubled in the past year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't seem very hopeful to close the deal on this price .
segments.speaker: S1
